name: OsiCuts
brief: Container for collections of row cuts and column cuts

algorithms.name:
Cut Pool Container for B&C
OsiCuts serves as a cut pool for branch-and-cut algorithms:
- Stores both row cuts (linear inequalities) and column cuts (bound changes)
- Provides iteration over all cuts
- Supports insertion, removal, and transfer of cuts

Typical usage in cut generation:
1. Cut generator creates OsiCuts object
2. Generator adds cuts via insert()
3. Solver applies cuts via OsiSolverInterface::applyCuts()

see: OsiSolverInterface::applyCuts for adding cuts to solver
OsiSolverInterface::applyCuts for applying cuts to a model
